tips.subtitle: Tips for taking clear progress photos
tips.title: Tips for taking clear progress photos
tips.lighting: Take the photo in strong, steady lighting (natural light is preferred).
tips.distance: Keep the same distance between you and the camera every time.
tips.angles: Take photos from the front, back, and both sides with the same pose.
tips.cameraHeight: Keep the camera roughly at mid-body level for a consistent perspective.
tips.timer: Use your phoneâ€™s timer to stabilize the camera and get into a comfortable pose.
tips.clothes: Wear comfortable and similar clothes each time to make changes clearer.
tips.background: Choose a simple, fixed background without clutter.
tips.frequency: Take progress photos every week or two for comparison.

header.title: Daily calorie calculator
header.desc: Calculate your daily needs based on your goal, and easily calculate food calories.

tips.bmr: Basal Metabolic Rate: energy your body burns at rest.
tips.tdee: Total Daily Energy Expenditure = BMR Ã— activity factor.
tips.target: Daily calories after applying your goal (bulking/cutting/maintenance).

notes.tdeeAvg: TDEE = Average of BMR formulas Ã— activity (or another accepted formula).
notes.goalsRange: Goals adjust calories from âˆ’40% to +40% depending on the goal.
notes.macrosBalance: Macro ratios automatically balance to total 100%.
notes.mealTip: Compare your meal with the target and adjust portions to reach your goal.
notes.activityHint: Choose activity level based on your daily lifestyle, not just your training.
